column4: Hello, I've just re-installed windows but now I want to get grub back. I put in the Ubuntu 6.06 cd and clicked boot from first hard disk and its taking me back to ubuntu ( thank god ). How do I install grub now

Hello, I've just re-installed windows but now I want to get grub back. I put in the Ubuntu 6.06 cd and clicked boot from first hard disk and its taking me back to ubuntu ( thank god ). How do I install grub now
I want to be able to select windows in grub as well as ubuntu
